name: angular-cardflow
description: Efficient & versatile CSS3 carousel/coverflow for angular

scripts.ng-min: ./tasks/banner | xargs -0 -I banner uglifyjs src/angular/cardflow.js --preamble banner -c -m --screw-ie8 -p relative --source-map dist/cardflow.min.js.map -o dist/cardflow.min.js
scripts.min: npm run-script css-min && npm run-script ng-min && plato -r -d report -l .jshintrc -t "cardflow" src/
scripts.lint: eslint -c .eslintrc src && jshint -c .jshintrc --reporter=unix src && jscs -c .jscsrc src

author: David Konsumer <konsumer@jetboystudio.com>
